ComicInfo.Summary: In the conclusion of SPAWN: ENDGAME, reporter Marc Rosen connects the miracle patient stories to the new SPAWN, Jim Downing, as detectives Sam, Twitch and Rowand discover the association between Downing's awakening, Bill Winston's suicide and the Nortego crime syndicate.

ComicInfo.Title: Endgame Conclusion
